title: Drawing, ca. 1848
medium: Red, blue, brown, orange, yellow and white tempera colors on heavy paper
description: Vertical rectangle.  Part of a repeat showing tulips and flowers with brown leaves against a white ground.  In upper right corner appears the number 24 (in ink).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ca. 1848.
ca. 1848. Red, blue, brown, orange, yellow and white tempera colors on heavy paper. Gift of John Judkyn. 1954-23-3.
